website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Alphabounce EM CTD is a neutral road running shoe that many users were fond of. Mostly, testers were glad that they were able to use it for different purposes – walking, light running, and going to the gym. Some observed that the shape and length were narrower and longer than usual, causing runners’ toes to feel compressed. Nonetheless, the shoe was still praised for its chic and stylish design.
pros: A majority of testers observed that the shoe was comfortable
Plenty of reviewers commended the upper
They mentioned that it looked chic and stylish
One user mentioned that the outsole performed well on trails
Plenty of runners used the shoe for different purposes
They appreciated that it was multi-functional
One tester observed that the water-resistant film on the upper performed well
cons: A couple of testers noticed that the shape of the shoe was a bit narrow, causing their toes to feel constricted
Based on a couple of reviews, the length of the shoe was a tad longer than usual
Reviewers were somewhat disappointed because they felt that the extra length did not compensate for the lack of room in the toe box
One runner’s foot hurt when he wore the Adidas Alphabounce EM CTD right out the box
Some testers agreed that it needed to be broken in first

customer_reviews.title: ... uncomfortable even after completely broken in they are not comfortable and are too hard and heavy compared to others
customer_reviews.text: These shows are so uncomfortable even after completely broken in they are not comfortable and are too hard and heavy compared to others. I have had many many adidas footwear over the decades and these are up there with the least comfortable ones. they look cool but not worth the swollen feet. I even git a size up from my normal adidas foot wear and still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. They are a little warm in Spring/Summer weather
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. They are a little warm in Spring/Summer weather, even with very thin wicking socks. I'm saving these for Fall/Winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Ohh... I love this ALPHABOUNCE MODEL
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent model of ADIDAS. Very, very happy with this purchase. Excellent manufacturing material They have made a very comfortable shoe that fits your foot and makes you feel very relaxed. It also has a novel and striking design. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ed.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these shoes! He has multiple colors and is continually repurchasing. He does wear a size 12 so he tends to have troubles finding styles he likes in store as shoe fit varies so much. These ones are always true to size regardless of color!
customer_reviews.author: AshMoore

customer_reviews.title: Not good fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small. And for some reason these enclosed shoes fo not fit me well, I think the hill on my foot is too steep for these kind of shoes and they feel really uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: P.O.P.

customer_reviews.title: however they are very comfortable and are great for jogging or running
customer_reviews.text: decent sneaker--- they dont breathe very well tho,, however they are very comfortable and are great for jogging or running.
customer_reviews.author: SkyNet

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected, comfort balanced with stability. This was my first try at the alphabounce and I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: iamsut

customer_reviews.title: but still a cool
customer_reviews.text: alil more snug than expected, less give than the other colors, but still a cool shoe
customer_reviews.author: LoneWolf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable after
customer_reviews.text: It is not comfortable brand new but just like my other bounce products, it gets better suited after many times of using the shoes, then it gets great on the feet
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Raymundo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for the last 6 month , almost on daily baisis and it still look new !! Loved it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This product actually exceeded my expectations, it is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Andre Johnson 31

customer_reviews.title: Order the right size and it will be sent to you.
customer_reviews.text: Came at the day they said it would and it looks and fit exactly how I had expected it should.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre P.

product_meta.title: adidas mens Alphabounce Em Ctd
feature_bullets: Runner type: neutral; Weight: 11 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 22 mm / forefoot: 12 mm)
BOUNCE cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility

Engineered mesh upper is a lightweight, breathable second skin providing a supportive, comfortable fit; FORGEDMESH upper designed with areas of support and stretch to help ensure a custom fit that adapts to every move
Coating on upper provides resistance to harsh weather conditions; Sock-like construction for snug fit; Neoprene tongue and heel; Stretch lining for fit and comfort
